attributes.action: ensure that Karen Matthews is not permitted to marry whilst in prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Karen Matthews, currently serving a prison term for false imprisonment of her daughter Shannon, and Craig Meehan, a convicted paedophile, wish to marry in prison and have children. 

Meehan has stated "So we have spoken about getting married inside and that is what we're going to do. People can't stop us. Karen's upset because she's lost all her kids. But it doesn't matter, because we're going to have another baby."

Everything in the Government's power should be done to prevent this pair of miscreants getting together and creating another child.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
